---
title: "Video tutorials"
---

Video tutorials were produced by international experts for YRA 2022 as an adaptation of the highly demanded in-person tutorials of YRA 2021 to the online-only format of the 2022 edition. They are hosted on YouTube in our [channel](https://www.youtube.com/@youngresearchersarchaeomet3034). Originally presented at [this edition's webpage](https://yrarchaeometry.weebly.com/tutorials.html), they are listed here for convenience. 

We are happy to extent the collection! If you have a tutorial you want to include, please [reach out to us](mailto:youngresearchersarch@gmail.com).  

## Bioarchaeology

* Kelly Blevins (Durham University): <br> [aDNA in Bioarchaeology -- Applications and sampling strategies](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m6rmqxKpi4c)
* Friðgeir Grímsson (University of Vienna): <br> [Is pollen useful for archaeological research? The what, why, and how!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y0L5fc927VI)
